hCalendar 11 - extracting organizer and attendee test

This page was design to test the extracting organizer and attendee information from hCalendar. Mainly that these properties are parsed as hCards.

From: hCalendar test suite 1.0

Author: Glenn Jones

Tests:

Test Result Comment
vevent[0].organizer.n.given-name[0] IsEqualTo("John") The organizer given-name value
vevent[0].organizer.n.family-name[0] IsEqualTo("Doe") The organizer family-name value
vevent[0].attendee[1].fn IsEqualTo("Jane Doe") The attendee fn value

History:

  • Created: 8 June 2008 by Glenn Jones
  • Updated: Corrected assert 1 and 2 to use contact hCard19 July 2010 by Glenn Jones
  • Updated: Corrected assert 1 and 2 to use organizer not contact hCard21 May 2011 by Lawrence Woodman
